headline: Stock Market Today: Dow Dives, Cybersecurity Plays Hit As Software Sinks; Gold Stocks Shine (Live Coverage)
summary: Indexes, including the Dow Jones industrials, dived on the stock market today. The EU made a Trump tariff move. Novo stock slid but gold plays shined.

headline: The Stocks Unscathed by Today’s Selloff
summary: The unlikely star of the stock market lately? Consumer staples stocks. The companies that sell groceries, cigarettes and household products were mostly unscathed by Monday’s selloff. Stocks like Mondelez International, the company behind Oreos and Ritz crackers, and toothpaste maker Colgate-Palmolive were among the top performers in the S&P 500.
